ARGUMENT
t x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | blscon.j | |- J = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |
| 2 |  | blscon.s | |- S = ( P ( ball ` ( abs o. - ) ) R ) |
| 3 |  | blscon.k | |- K = ( J |`t S ) |
| 4 |  | #P_cnxmet | |- ( abs o. - ) e. ( *Met ` CC ) |
| 5 |  | #P_blssm | |- ( ( ( abs o. - ) e. ( *Met ` CC ) /\ P e. CC /\ R e. RR* ) -> ( P ( ball ` ( abs o. - ) ) R ) C_ CC ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_mp3an1 | |- ( ( P e. CC /\ R e. RR* ) -> ( P ( ball ` ( abs o. - ) ) R ) C_ CC ) |
| 7 | 2, 6 | #P_syl5eqss | |- ( ( P e. CC /\ R e. RR* ) -> S C_ CC ) |
| 8 | 2 | #P_blcvx | |- ( ( ( P e. CC /\ R e. RR* ) /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S /\ t e. ( 0 [,] 1 ) ) ) -> ( ( t x. x ) + ( ( 1 - t ) x. y ) ) e. S ) |
| 9 | 7, 8, 1, 3 | #P_cvxscon | |- ( ( P e. CC /\ R e. RR* ) -> K e. SCon ) |
